channel.title: NVIDIA Podcast
channel.description: The Official NVIDIA Podcast Worldwide leader in programmable graphics processor technologies. Featured Topic: Are you ready for Windows Vista? Please visit http://www.nvidia.com/windowsvista
channel.itunes:author: NVIDIA (www.nvidia.com)

item.title: State of New York v. Intel
item.description: State of New York v. Intel
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: U.S. Federal Trade Commission v. Intel
item.description: U.S. Federal Trade Commission v. Intel
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: NVIDIA Redefines Notebook PCs with new Graphics Processors
item.description: Learn how NVIDIA's new GeForce 8M Series notebook GPUs are enabling a new generation of notebook PCs that will give you a full visual experience in Windows Vista, video, and games as well a the new wave of GPU-enabled applications like Adobe Acrobat.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: NVIDIA launches the GeForce 8500 and 8600 GPUs
item.description: NVIDIA product manager Justin Walker discusses the latest edition to the GeForce 8 family of graphics processors.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Introducing "Designed by NVIDIA" Motherboards
item.description: Learn about NVIDIA's new line of "Designed by NVIDIA" motherboards and how they differ from other motherboards.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Graphics Processing in a 3D World
item.description: Rob Csonger, vice president of corporate marketing at NVIDIA, talks about the visual emphasis of Windows Vista.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Introducing Windows Vista Sideshow and the NVIDIA Preface Gadget Platform
item.description: Philip Bernosky, Product Line Manager at NVIDIA answers questions about Windows Vista Sideshow and the new NVIDIA Preface Gadget Platform.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Accelerating Windows Vista with NVIDIA GPUs
item.description: Scott Vouri, NVIDIA's general manager of multimedia, explains the what and why of graphics processing units and how having a high quality GPU will help take advantage of Microsoft Windows Vista's 3D graphic environment.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Introducing GeForce 8800 GPUs and nForce 600 Series MCPs
item.description: NVIDIA showcased new GeForce 8800 GPUs at the GeForce LAN 3 event event in San Jose, CA. Ujesh Desai, NVIDIA's General Manager of Desktop GPUs, introduces the highly-anticipated product release and what GeForce 8800 GPUs and nForce 600 series MCPs mean for PC gaming.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Modding PC's with Craig "Tech Daddy" Tate (Part 1 of 2)
item.description: Craig "Tech Daddy" Tate, a well known PC modder, sits down with NVIDIA to discuss his experiences with modding computers. In part one of this two-part podcast series, Craig introduces modding basics, reveals techniques for new modders, and provides recommendations for successfully modding computers.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Overclocking and SLI Technology with Craig "Tech Daddy" Tate (Part 2 of 2)
item.description: In part two of this podcast series, Craig "Tech Daddy" Tate explains why he uses NVIDIA SLI Technology for his modding projects. Craig also details his upcoming modding project for the Dallas Stars NHL Hockey team as well as his experiences and recommendations for overclocking PC's.
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Inside NVIDIA SLI Technology
item.description: NVIDIA's Chris Daniel introduces NVIDIA SLI technology, a revolutionary platform innovation that allows you to intelligently scale PC graphics performance by combining multiple NVIDIA graphics solutions in a single system with an NVIDIA nForce SLI media and communications processor (MCP).
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Windows Vista: How Your Motherboard Makes a Difference
item.description: NVIDIA's Drew Henry and George Meyers introduce NVIDIA nForce-based motherboards, the stable, reliable, high-performance foundation for Windows Vista Capable PCs. Get the details on how the combination of NVIDIA nForce-based motherboards and NVIDIA GeForce GPUs are essential ingredients for a great Windows Vista experience. Featured Topic: Are you ready for Windows Vista? Please visit http://www.nvidia.com/windowsvista
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Inside Windows Vista Beta 2: Features, Drivers, and FAQs
item.description: NVIDIA's Andrew Fear and Lew Wagman discuss Windows Vista Beta 2, covering the latest features like Flip 3D and Windows Aero. In addition, NVIDIA answers frequently asked questions regarding NVIDIA GPUs and Windows Vista. Featured Topic: Are you ready for Windows Vista? Please visit http://www.nvidia.com/windowsvista
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: PC gaming to hit new high with Windows Vista
item.description: NVIDIA sits down with top game developers at the 2006 Game Developers Conference to discuss the latest PC games, Windows Vista, and NVIDIA GPUs. Featured Topic: Are you ready for Windows Vista? Please visit http://www.nvidia.com/windowsvista
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: NVIDIA unveils extreme high-definition gaming
item.description: General Manager of NVIDIA GeForce GPUs, Ujesh Desai, introduces you to the NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX, GeForce 7900 GT, and GeForce 7600 GT bringing extreme high-definition gaming to multiple market segments. Featured Topic: Are you ready for Windows Vista? Please visit http://www.nvidia.com/windowsvista
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA

item.title: Are you ready for Windows Vista?
item.description: NVIDIA Software Product Manager, Andrew Fear, introduces you to NVIDIA's software and hardware solutions, making sure you are ready for Microsoft's Windows Vista. Featured Topic: Are you ready for Windows Vista? Please visit http://www.nvidia.com/windowsvista
item.itunes:author: NVIDIA
